mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM asset_history
LEFT JOIN hmmMember ON asset_history.history_member_id=hmm_member.member_id
LEFT JOIN tgateDb ON hmm_member.member_id=tgate_db.tgate_member_id
LEFT JOIN assetInfo ON asset_history.history_asset_number=asset_info.asset_number
LEFT JOIN asset_model ON asset_info.asset_model_name=asset_model.model_name
order by asset_history.history_completion_date DESC, asset_history.history_member_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO asset_history ( history_completion_date, history_request_date, history_asset_type, history_type, history_requester, history_worker, history_member_id, history_asset_number, history_request_details, history_reqeust_etc, history_spec_1, history_spec_2, history_spec_3 ) VALUES ( #{historyCompletionDate}, #{historyRequestDate}, #{historyAssetType}, #{historyType}, #{historyRequester}, #{historyWorker}, #{historyMemberId}, #{historyAssetNumber}, #{historyRequestDetails}, #{historyReqeustEtc}, #{historySpec1}, #{historySpec2}, #{historySpec3} )
